file_content.text: Master Satele, we've arrived at Belsavis. Have you learned anything?
The Empire just launched a surprise attack there. Dangerous prisoners are free from their cells to wreak havoc down on the surface.
A mere diversion. The Emperor has only one true goal - the annihilation of all life on this world.
Just tell me what to do.
I'll stop him.
Wiping out an entire planet isn't easy.
What's his plan?
We don't know how the Emperor intends to destroy all life on Belsavis.
If he wants to execute a bunch of sociopathic criminals, I say we let him.
Good riddance to bad rubbish.
Jedi respect life. And not all on the world are criminals. The guards and their families live on the surface, too.
The destruction of Belsavis will fuel the Emperor's ritual and make him unstoppable.
We do have one lead. Intelligence indicates a high-ranking Imperial named Executor Krannus recently arrived on world.
Krannus is a pure-blooded Sith. Fanatically loyal to the Emperor. Whatever the plan is, he's the one tasked with carrying it out.
Do we have any idea where Executor Krannus is now?
Not if I find him first.
What else can you tell me about Executor Krannus?
You know him?
Unlike most of Sith blood, Krannus was not born with an affinity for the Force.
Despite this, he has risen quickly through the ranks of the Emperor's army. It would be a mistake to underestimate him.
He can't carry out the plan if he's dead.
Guess I'll have to kill him.
Enna Tabord, a member of our Order, is already on the surface looking for Krannus.
She'll help you find the Executor. But she isn't strong enough to stop him - that task falls on you.
Yes, master.
If these are the most dangerous criminals in the galaxy, should we just leave them on the loose?
And the escaped prisoners?
If the Emperor succeeds in his ritual all life in the galaxy will be extinguished.
What your companion says is true, but Jedi do not turn their backs on those in need.
Do not endanger your mission, but do what you can to help the Republic restore order.
Sometimes I feel like I'm the only Jedi getting anything done.
Doesn't it always?
We all serve in our own way. You are our greatest warrior... and our best hope.
Go to the planet's surface and meet Enna at the coordinates I'm sending you now. May the Force be with you.
